doc.description: 投工单类型统计工单信息

sql.name: hbeoms.formtypedeallink
sql.item: select form.c1, form.c700000001, form.c700000003 as 工单编号, form.c700000006 as 建单时间, form.c700000004 as 建单人, form.c700000011 as 主题, form.c700000015 as 紧急程度, form.c700000014 as 所属专业, form.c700000010 as 工单状态 from (select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) h,{400} t,{1} form where h.C700020019=0 and h.c700020001=form.c1 and h.c700020002=form.c700000001 and h.C700020011='已完成' and t.C650000002=h.C700020002 {6} {5} {2}

sql.name: hbeoms.formadealcategorylink
sql.item: select 't'||ars.SCHEMAID from ARSCHEMA ars,{400} t where ars.name=t.C650000002 {6}
